description: Verify BR-RDM-003: Successful redemption confirmation deducts shares from total and available balances. Scenario: User redeems 500 shares out of 1000. Manager confirms success. System must update holdings and generate confirmation files.
source_rule_logic: Upon successful confirmation of a redemption, the system must deduct the confirmed share amount from both 'totalShares' and 'availableShares' simultaneously to maintain the synchronization of the available balance.
